attributes.action: Get Rid Of UK School Uniforms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Believe that Uniforms should Be Abolished in England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland

------

Our Reasons

1. No student induviduality

2. Some cases, actually cost alot of money

3. Has nothing to do with actual acedemics - dressing in uniforms do not improve acedemics

4. no self expression

5. students more comforable in own style of clothing

6. does not break down barrier between social classes in a school

7. Safety how the heck are parents supossed to recognize their kids in a time of choas when everyone is wearing the same thing

8. TOO much DISIPLINE - you may think that this is never possible b/c in the real world people have to dress a like and have a dress code but school is also a place for people who want to be actors and writers and not be like everyone else - not everyone conforms to the ideas enforced in school and becomes some professional money-maker by wearing uiforms, it is like taking another step to makeing student conform to everyone elses ideas and not being themselves

9. can even interfere with religious freedom

10. Has NO use outside of school
